# waterSubmersionAvailable

**Type Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the current device supports the submersion manager.

## Declaration

```swift
class var waterSubmersionAvailable: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

On Apple Watch Ultra, the system sets `waterSubmersionAvailable` to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. On all other devices and in Simulator, the system sets it to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Checking availability and authorization

- **authorizationStatus**: A value indicating whether the app has user authorization to receive submersion data.
